coreAtributes.name: ribbon collar
coreAtributes.description: A cute collar decorated with pleated ribbons and a pretty bow.

displacementText.playerSelf: You take off your ribbon collar.
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You roughly pull the ribbon collar from [npc.namePos] neck.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] roughly pulls the ribbon collar from your neck.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.Name] roughly pulls the ribbon collar from [npc2.namePos] neck.

replacementText.playerSelf: You fasten the ribbon collar around your neck.
replacementText.playerNPC: You fasten the ribbon collar around [npc.namePos] neck.
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You forcefully fasten the ribbon collar around [npc.namePos] neck.
replacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.Name] fastens the ribbon collar around [npc.her] neck.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] fastens the ribbon collar around your neck.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] forcefully fastens the ribbon collar around your neck
replacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] fastens the ribbon collar around [npc2.namePos] neck.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.Name] forcefully fastens the ribbon collar around [npc2.namePos] neck.
